content:
The Polish Government Donald Tusk, at a meeting with US President Joe Biden at the White House, discussed further joint support for Ukraine in reflecting Russian aggression.

AboutIt is saidOn the White House website.

“President Joe Biden greeted President Andrzej Duda and Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk at a joint meeting at the White House on March 12. This historical visit celebrates the 25th anniversary of Poland's accession to NATO and emphasizes the iron strength of our two nations with the dedication of the Alliance of NATO. The leaders pledged to continue the support of Ukraine's self -defense from Russia, ”the message reads.

In his Twitter Joe BidenHe notedthat their meeting once again makes it clear that Poland and the United States are proud to stand on the side of Ukraine in the face of Russia's cruel invading war.

As reported by the Armyinform, USAannouncedAbout the military aid package of Ukraine for $ 300 million.
title: US and Poland leaders pledged to continue Ukraine's support
